alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:43AM EST until February 26 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At Beverly affecting Washington County. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At Beverly. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low areas, and farmland, camps, and a few homes are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 28.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning, cresting at 30.1 feet early this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.9 feet on 02/07/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EST.
